1.content:
You're a citizen of an unamed city somewhere in the United States. You live in a peaceful and uneventful life. However none of these details truly matter because soon you'll encounter something far larger than anything you've ever deal with before.

(I understand this is a boring short chapter but I'm not trying to wow you with an long boring plot, not yet anyway!)

Now choose you Charater...
1.title: Story Start

choices: At school. (Perhaps a giant exchange student?)
During a walk through the city.
On a school field trip. (A lab accident affects one of the students?)
11.content:
You're name is Byan Tompson just an average 15 year old highschool student. You often make stupid mistakes and take risks, but you've always been able to handle yourself except for when it comes to girls.

However that's another story for another time, right now it time for you to encounter the giant. Where to you meet this surpersized person?
11.title: Byan

choices: Vlad, a fifteen-foot tall fifteen year old Russian student.
Eriko, a twenty-foot tall sixteen-year-old Japanese student.
111.content:
"Byan Tompson, please report to the Principal's office immediately," the announcement comes over the loudspeaker. Everyone in your class gives a loud "ooooo", mockingly, but you know you've done nothing to get you into trouble. At least, you can't think of anything.

You quickly make your way to the principal's office, where Mr. Brown (the principal) is waiting. "Byan, come in!" You do so, and have a seat across from his desk. He sits down. "Byan, let's cut to the chase. As you hopefully remember, you signed up last year to be a foreign exchange student assistant during this school year."

"Uh, yeah," you reply. You vaguely remember signing up for that program in order to impress a girl you liked who was in the program, but the girl ended up moving to France as a foreign exchange student for a year, so you forgot about it.

"Well, we have a new foreign exchange student who needs a dedicated student, like yourself, to help them. They will be assigned the same class schedule as you, and you can help them with America, our school system and way of life. We've already contacted your parents, and they've agreed to make the necessary adjustments so they will be able to live with you."

"Live with me?" you ask, bewildered.

"Yes, of course!" Mr. Brown replied. "Don't you remember that was one of the major components of the program?"

"Okay..." you say, unconvincingly.

"Yes, well..." Mr. Brown clears his throat. "Now, this student is going to require extra delicacy and patience from his assistant. Due to some...circumstances, they've never attended school in his country, but has studied at home all their life. They're extremely intelligent, but his people skills might need some work, and school might be a very stimulating experience for them."

"Circumstances?" you ask. "What do you mean?"

"Hmm. Perhaps it will be best if you go ahead and meet them. Follow me." Mr. Brown stands up, leaves his office, and walks outside. You follow him toward the back of the school. As you round the corner, you nearly bump into something. You jump back when you notice that what you've bumped into is a leg of a giant human!

"Byan," Mr. Brown says, "meet...
111.title: I didn't sign up for THIS!

1112.content:
"Here, he is, I mean she is!" says Mr Brown. You look up and notice its a giant Japanese girl. She was wearing a skirt that went down to her knees and a sweater. Her hair was black along with her eyes.

"Eriko, this is Bryan." Mr Brown says to her.

"Hi there." she says, reaching down to shake your hand but accidentally knocks you down."Oh, sorry." she says and picks you up, setting down on the ground, rather easily. "Very nice to meet you." she says, with a slight Japanese accent.
1112.title: Something Big Cropped Up

11121.content:
"I'll leave you two to get to know each other then." Mr Brown says as he heads to his office.

"When does class start?" Eriko asks

"Now, actually but its free period now since you arrived before free period ended. Maybe we should find a place to sit." you say. You and Eriko go to a tree and sit under the shade.

"Are you still growing?" you ask her.

"Not sure. I should have stopped by now, I read that girls usually finish their growing by now or still have little to go." she says. " Do you have a girlfriend?" she asks. Your taken aback by the question.

"No. Girls don't usually go for guys like me, I'm a little of an outcast but I have friends. What about you?"

" Well, I've never had a guy who said he liked, guys usually like their girlfriends to be smaller than them."

" Well, who knows maybe you will find a guy that likes you here."
11121.title: Free Period

choices: Eriko comes back and rescues you from Fred.
You managed to get away on your own.
111212.content:
You start to talk but you stop when you see the class bully." I have to hide. Fat Fred is here and he's gonna pound me." You scramble up a tree and hide aong the branches.

"Well no wonder he wants to beat you , you call him names." said Eriko.

" He insists we call him that and its not really fat, from first hand experience it seems to be muscle. And stop talking to me until hes gone." you say.

"Your cute like that." said Eriko.

" Ssshhhh! Go hide somewhere!" you order. Eriko listens and leaves just as Fred arrives at the tree, not noticing Eriko.

"All right Thompson, get down there and give me your lunch money." said Fred.

" Nope." you reply

"Wrong answer!" Fred yells as he begins to climb the tree.
111212.title: Fat Fred?

1112121.content:
Bryan tries to escape from Fred by climbing further up the tree but Fred proved to be equally adept at tree climbing.

" Why can't we settle this like civilised people?" you ask Fred.

' Well, thats for wimps like you who can't put up a fight." said Fred. Bryan tries to go higher but slips and fall out of the tree, landing on the ground. Bryan attempts to get up but is stopped by Fred having properly come down from the Tree. " You know, aren't going a bit old for this thing?" Bryan tried being diplomatic. " No, now will you give me the money?" he asks, his fist inches from your face.


You are about to reply when Fred feels something around his waist. Around his waist are five, pale slender things. Bryan soon realised they were fingers. Fred was screaming. " Help me ! Help me!" as he rose higher and higher into the sky until he was face to face with Eriko. She did not look happy.

' Why do you want to harm him? And be honest " she asks, her voice emitting anger. " Well, he owes me money and he promised to pay me back but he didn't." Fred answers her question, he is afraid of Eriko. " Did you Bryan?" Eriko asks him. " No, its more like he beats me up for extra money cause he can't make his own." said Bryan. " Thats not true, he really owes me money." said Fred. "BULLSHIT!"

The three of them, Fred, Bryan and Eriko looked around and saw a crowd that had gathered around them. It was the crowd who had screamed out the reply to Fred's lie. " Really? Is this true?" Eriko asks the crowd. They nod, Eriko turns her attention to Fred.

" I ought to give you a taste of your own medicine but that would mean I'm as bad as you" says Eriko. " Instead, I'm going to do this." she reaches into his pants and gives him the atomic wedgie. She places him on the ground, his underwear stretched. He has difficulty walking due to the circumstances and falls to the ground.

The crowd applaudes Eriko for her actions and they all try to hug her. Most just hug her leg. " Thank you, thank you but really its just one guy." she says trying to be modest.
1112121.title: Big Rescue

11121212.content:
" I'm very upset about this." said a voice. The crowd turned and gasped, it was their principal. Everyone fled the scene except for Bryan and Eriko who stayed behind. " Well, Bryan , it seems only yesterday you were in my office." said the principal. " I swear, I didn't put the fake vomit in the cafeteria." said Bryan.

" Yes well, this concerns a Fred Johnson, whom I discovered wandering the halls , moaning with his underpants worn on his head. I decided to investigate and it leads to you two. Explain." he said, in a very upset tone.

" Well, I realised that he was-" Eriko was cut off by Bryan. " She realised was that Fred was bullying someone and wanted to step in to protect him. I decided to do it on her behalf. Thats why Fred was wandering the halls with his undies on his head." said Bryan.

" You. Detention after school. " said the principal. He looked up at Eriko. " Welcome to school, I hope you'll enjoy your time here." said the principal.

He left , leaving the two of them alone to themselves.
11121212.title: The Principal Intervenes

111212122.content:
After Bryan came out of detention, he was surprised to find Eriko waiting for him by the school gate. " Wow, your still here. " said Bryan. ' Well, why not I decided to wait for you." said Eriko.

" Well, what do you want to do?" asked Bryan. " Well, I thought we could hang out in the city or something." said Eriko. " Well, you might not be able to fit into many stores." said Bryan. " Thats all right, we could go to a cafe or something and just talk." said Bryan.

" Or I could introduce you to my friends." said Bryan. Eriko thought for awhiel and made a choice. " Why don't you introduce me to your to friends." said Eriko. " Alright then, lets go."

Do his friends take to Eriko well?
111212122.title: Later....

1112121222.content:
You lead her to a somewhat hidden spot in the park where you and your friends usually meet up to play something or just chat. Whe you're almost arriving, you turn around and "face" Ericko.

"Listen", you say, "Why don't you stay here while I talk to them about you... you know, before they meet you".

"Umm... OK", she says, "But why would you do that?".

"Well, it's just that the guys are not used to see people like you?", you said.

"Well, of course not, I've never been here before", she answers.

"Yeah, yah, of course", you say, "What I meant is that they might be a little surprised when they notice you're...".

She interrupts you: "What? Foreign? Asian?....Beautiful?".

"Well", you answered, "I was thinking about.... you know.... b...big".

"Oh, right", she said with a saddened expression, "I almost forgot".

"Hey, don't be sad", you said, "I'm sure they'll like you".

"Really?", she said.

"Of course!", you answered, "They're great!".

She smiled a little.

"I'll be right back!", you said, walking towards your friends.

"Hi guys!", you say.

"Hi!", they answered. They were 3 girls and 2 guys.

"I'd like you to meet someone. She's... well, a little... tall, so try to make her feel confortable, OK?", you ask.

"Sure!", one of the girls says. "I mean, none of us is emarrassed about our height".

"No, I mean, REALLY tall", you say.

"Come on!", one of the guys said, "We don't care if she's REALLY tall (mocking you)".

"OK. Just don't do or say anything when you see her. Most important, don't even mention her height.", you say, "Fine, here we go. Eriko! Please come here. I'd like to introduce you to my friends!".

Eriko appeared from behind of some trees, walking right infront of you and your friends.

"Hi", she said, "I'm Bryan's friend. Or, maybe I should say... Nihongo!". She giggled.

All five of them stared at her mouth open, astonished. When they finally were able to speak, they expressed themselves in...
1112121222.title: Surprise!

choices: She continues arguing, now REALLY pissed off.
11121212222.content:
"Wh... what the hell is that?", asked one of the girls (Sophie).

"Hey!", said Eriko, offended. "I'm not a WHAT, I'm a WHO".

"No you're not!", said one of the guys (Adam). "I saw the movie. The Who's are tiny, while you're... well... ginormous!".

"OK, first of all, you don't say ginormous", she said, trying to change a little the subject. "That word is just some slang that was made up from the blending words "Gigantic", that comes from the root "Gigas (giant)"; and "Enromous", from the roots "Ex (out of)" and "norma (rule)".

All looked at her, speechless. You tried to ease the mood a little.

"She's very intelligent", you said, causing her to blush a lot.

"No, I'm not", she said, "I just like ethymology a lot".

Your friends started to get even more pissed off.

"Oh, yeah?", asked one of the other girls (Julie), "Then tell me, what's the ethymology of Bigfoot".

"Well", said Eriko, "Bigfoot is actually another slang. Big + foot, obviously. The correct word is Sasquatch, which comes from the Salishan language of southwestern British Columbia, which means.... Hey! I understood that! It wasn't funny!".

"Sure it was", said the other guy (Mick), chuckling.

"No, it wasn't!", said Eriko, starting to piss off, too. "And I don't have big feet. Indeed, we asians actually have small feet. The average asian girl foot is 24 cm (9.5 inch) long".

"Asians do, I agree", said Julie, "But you... well... look at that! You must wear those...um... rubber clog-like shoes daily. I haven't seen any shoes that size before. I mean, come on! Look at yourself! Those feet have to be at least 3 ft long!".

"3.28 ft, actually", said Eriko, "Besides, my feet are NOT big! There's no such thing as big and small. It all depends on the proportion. They might look big compared to yours, but they're the right size compared to the rest of my body".

"Yeah?", said Sophie, "Well YOU are ginormous... sorry, gigantic and enormous (mocking her), to the rest of the world. So that makes you, and your huge feet, HUMONGOUS!".

"That's another slang word", said Eriko, trying to beat them in the only thing she could (according to her), "It's the...".

"Yeah, yeah!", said the last girl (Rachel), "Shut up! We already know you're really, really smart. Besides, if you are that smart, why did it took you too long to realize the Bigfoot joke?".

"Because... ", said Eriko, but stopped, not really knowing what to say. "Because...".
11121212222.title: Discussion!

choices: asked you why didn't you defend her.
111212122221.content:
Now really feeling under pressure, and not standing a chance to win a 5 vs 1 discussion, she fell to her knees (making the ground shake a little) and began to cry.

"Awwwww", said Rachel, "Poor little...um... huge girl is sad?".

"Why don't you call mommy?", said Adam. "Hey, I bet her name is Godzilla!".

Everyone laughed at his joke, except you and Eriko. You could not believe your ears. They had never, ever, been so cruel with anyone. Not even close.

"Why are you doing this to me?", asked Eriko, still crying. "I just wanted to be friendly".

"Yeah!", you said, really angry now. "She was just being nice, but you started to insult her with no reason. Why? Because she's different?".

"REALLY different", said Sophie.

"Whatever, just cut it out!", you answered.

"Whatever", said Mick, "Let's go guys. Leave him with his titanic girlfriend".

They all walked away. You turned to look at Eriko. She looked back at you and...
111212122221.title: Crying

choices: You go for dinner at Eriko's place.
1112121222211.content:
Out of nowhere, Eriko suddenly grabbed you and gave you a huge hug." Why do they have to be so mean to me?" asked Eriko, tears flowing from her eyes. You tried to bring your face out of her chest as she was hugging real tight.

You motioned for her to ease up and she noticed you were struggling and let go of you. " Well, your kind of a new experience to them. Besides, I swear they've never been this mean to anyone before." you said.

" Really?' asked Eriko. " I wouldn't have befriended any of them if they treated everyine like that." said you. " But they were so mean to me." said Eriko. " I know, I'll try to get them to apologise. " you said. " If they don't?" she asked you.

You thought for awhile. On one hand, you had your friends to lose if they refused to reconcile with Eriko. On the other hand, if you sided with them, you could lose Eriko, a beautiful 20 foot giantess from Japan.

" I'll stick with you if they don't want to be friends with you even if they stop bring friends with me. " you tell her, making a decision. This stops her cryong and a smile breaks out on her face. ' Thank you, Bryan, your practically my only friend." said Eriko. " You'll make more friends, I'm sure of it." said you.
1112121222211.title: A Hug

11121212222112.content:
You reached your house, Eriko giving you a lift back home( Literally). It was a testing day for you. You made friends with a 20 foot Japanese girl , got into a fight with the school bully and had all your friends didn't want to be friends with Eriko because she was much bigger than them.

You entered the living room and was greeted by your father who was watching televison. Your mom was upstairs taking a bath( though thats not important). " How was your day, son?" asked your dad. You sat down next to him on the couch, unsure of what to do." Dad, did you ever have problems with your friends when you were in high school?" you asked him. " What kind of problems?" asked your dad.

" Well, I've met this new girl , shes not my girlfriend by the way, and she well doesn't get along with my other friends." you say. " Well is it her fault or theirs?" asked dad. " Its their fault, they won't accept her . They treat her as though she's 20 feet tall, she maybe tall but not that tall!" you reply. You did not think that you dad would believe that Eriko was a 20 foot giantess.

" Well, I'd stick by this new friend, she is not in the wrong." said your father. " Thanks dad."
11121212222112.title: At Home

choices: You take her to the unpopular kids.
111212122221122.content:
The next day , you decided to wait outside the gate for Eriko since it was early and you still had time. Then , you saw Eriko making her way to school. She was wearing a plain top today coupled with blue denim jeans and some pink flip-flops as footwear.

She looked cheerful, seemingly able to put what had happened yesterday behind her. She saw you and you waved to her. She waved back. Eriko stopped a few feet away and spoke.

" So, hows your day been?" said Eriko. " Fine, how about yours since you know yesterday?" you replied. " Well, its ok. I'm not used to it, people in my hometown are more accepting than people here but I guess your right, people aren't used to seeing someone like me." said Eriko.

" Thats good to hear but I know people who will accept you for who you really are." said you. " Really? Lets meet them." said Eriko.
111212122221122.title: In school.

1112121222211222.content:
" If it isn't freakzilla and her mini boyfriend." you hear a voice saying that. You turn in the direction of the voice and realise its your "friends" again and they were up to no good again. " Come on guys, I've never seen you like this. Why can't you accept Eriko the way you accepted me?" you ask them.

" Oh please, we never really accepted you. We were just waiting for a moment like this to dump you with your titanic asian friend." said one girl. You felt so hurt. " Fine, I'll just go without you then!" said you. Your friends leave , now they were no longer your friends. Eriko looked shocked as well. " I'm sorry, Bryan." said Eriko.

' Its all right, I never really liked them anyway." you reply, trying to hid your wiping of tears from Eriko. You felt as though you might be falling in love with her. " Hey Bryan! Who's your friend? Aren't you going to introduce me to your lovely young titaness friend?" You smiled upon hearing those words.

It was Corbin, your childhood friend. He was like you in many ways. He had brown skin and was a little more popular than you. " Wanna go on a date, pretty thing?" he asked Eriko. Eriko blushed. " Sorry but no thanks I already like someone else. " said Eriko. " Its ok, so Bryan I heard about yesterday. I knew it , I told you not to hang out with them but you did and look what happened but I'm glad your back now.
1112121222211222.title: Samuel

11121212222112221.content:
You heard the bell ring and Corbin ,Eriko and yourself knew what it meant. It was time for class and the three of you rushed off to class. Eriko stopped and realised something. " Errm guys, you know I can't fit in through that door." said Eriko. " Oh yes, how silly of me." said Corbin.

Instead, Eriko brought you and Corbin to the right window before putting you guys inside. " Well that was a new experience. "you said to Corbin. " Nothing beats a giantess transportation service." said Corbin. Both of them looked out at Eriko who smiled at them.
11121212222112221.title: Class

choices: You spare her feelings and decide to do something else.
111212122221122211.content:
After class you and Corbin exit out the main door of the school. There you see Eriko waiting by the school gate. On the way you the three of you spot your former friends. Everyone exchanges glares at each other as they pass by, but no one utters a word.

"I glad nothing went down." Corbin says when you old friends are out of earshot. You don't say anything your still little upset about how they treated you and Eriko before.

"So what do you guys want to do? I'm up for anything." Eriko says trying to brighten up the mood. "How about I meet your family Bryan?" Your a bit shocked by this you don't know how your parents would react if you brought a 20ft tall Asian school girl home. Quickly you think of an excuse to derail her suggestion.

"We can't my parents aren't home yet." you lie. Eriko makes a frowning face.

"What about your house Corbin?" she asks. Corbin shakes his head.

"My folks aren't home either." he says.

"Why don't we go to your foster home." you suggest. Eriko looks puzzled at you for a second.

"Foster home?" she says confused by your words.

"Yeah um, You are a foreign exchange student from Japan right? you ask her. Eriko nods. "Doesn't that mean you moved to America and you're staying with a foster family?" Eriko takes a second to think.

"I'm guessing that's how most foreign exchanges go, but my family moved here along with me." Eriko explains. You notice she seems to be rather nervous when she mentions her family.

"If you guys really want to meet my family we can go to my house." she says. You noticed sweat starting to form on her forehead while she speaks.

"Maybe she is embarrassed by her family?" you think to yourself.
111212122221122211.title: After School....

1112121222211222111.content:
' Lets go to your house. " said Corbin. " Umm, ok. " said Eriko rather nerously, you seem to have been oblivous to the fact that she was nervous about you meeting her folks.

She leads you guys to her place. " Its a really long walk from school. Takes me half an hour to get there, you guys better hope on my shoulder. " she says putting you and Corbin on each shoulder.

The view from there is great. You can imagine what Eriko must be seeing. " Its a really good view when your twenty feet tall." you tell her. " Thanks but sometimes I wish I was normal like you guys." said Eriko.


Eriko left the suburb and into a forested area. " Did we just leave civilisation?" asked Corbin. " If by civilisation, you mean buildings, roads and stuff, yeah we're leaving it." said Eriko. " Guess a girl of your stature needs a lot of space to live in." you say.

You reach the gates and Eriko puts you down. She rings the doorbell and waits nervously for someone to open it.

Why is Eriko nervous about you two meeting her family?
1112121222211222111.title: Her place.

choices: Military personnel swarming all over the place.
A Japanese guy older then you three coming out to meet you.
11121212222112221112.content:
The gate opened and she looked at you guys nervously as she stepped in. " Errm.. guys, I think theres something you should know about me." she said, stopping to talk to you guys.

" Whats that" asked Corbin, he was puzzled by Eriko being so nervous over them coming over to her place. " I'm an orphan." she replied, biting her lip in anticipation of their reaction.

" Oh thats fine, well sorry about you not having your parents but really thats fine by us. " you reply, she seemed relieved by it. " I'm really happy tthat you find it ok. " shee siad, smiling a little.

" Come on, its a long walk in so we better get started as quickly as possible." said Eriko, nudging them forward with her knee. This caused both of you to stumble but luckily you both maintained your balance.

A few minutes later...



You guys reach her house. " My legs are killing me. Can we stop?" said Corbin. " Why? We're already here." said Eriko, her long legs giving nearly four times the walking speed of a normal human. You look at where she stays and see...
11121212222112221112.title: She's an orphan.

choices: He takes them to the interrogation room.
111212122221122211121.content:
" Eriko, whys your house with the Army?" asked Corbin. Your a little confused by what he said until you see the scene. " Ok, this is disturbing. I think your not telling us something Eriko but maybe you should tell them we come in peace.

" Sure guys, they'll let you in." she says walking to them. " Come on, don't stay behind, you'll make them suspicious." she says. That got you and Corbin to walk over. The army men see Eriko and wave to her, many of them saying hello.

In turn, Eriko greets them and a Caucasian man of high rank comes out. " Hi Dad. I brought some friends." said Eriko, introducing you and Corbin. " Ok, I told you can't bring your friends here. Its bad. " said her father.

" Err.. we won't talk if you want. We'll forget everything. " said Corbin. " Now, now, we won't black bag you. You just need to sign some forms and it'll be ok." said Erikos Dad. ' I'll go change out of these guys, you have a nice chat." said Eriko going into her room, a custom made house built for her.
111212122221122211121.title: Military personnel swarming all over the place.

choices: Greg takes you around, showing the place.
1112121222211222111211.content:
Eriko's father takes you to a bench nearby and both of you sit in it. " Now, this may get a little confusing for you guys but Eriko was born this way." said her father. " Is she human?" asked Corbin. " Yes but she has had some minor alterations to her DNA." said her father.

" For easy refernces, just call me Greg." he said. " Let me ask you a question. What do you know about Hiroshima?" asked Greg. " Nice place to visit in Japan.Eriko said her family came from there." said Corbin. " Its where Fat Man was dropped. We nuked the place." said Greg.

" Thats terrible!" you blurt out. " It was unneccsassry I admit, the war was ending. But many people died but a group survived." said Greg. " Shortly afterwards, the Japanese government contacted us. They said something weird happened to the survivors. We came in and saw the survivors, they had grown to double their height.

We took the group to America where they lived. Thats where it all went wrong. I think it must have been the radiation, around 16 years ago they went crazy, attacking anyone they saw. We had to put them down because the danger they caused.

One of them was pregnant with child and we removed the child. That child was Eriko, we tested her for any of the stuff that made her family go crazy, turns out she's fine. They went crazy due to the confinement and stuff, we gave Eriko as normal a childhood as she could have.

By the way, don't tell her what I told you. It could really hurt her." said Greg.

" Got it," you both reply.
1112121222211222111211.title: Erikos father explains everything.

choices: Switch to you and Corbin after leaving her house.
She invites you to stay for dinner.
11121212222112221112111.content:
As they were done, Eriko appeared. She was done with her bath and was wearing a white t-shirt with a pair of grey shorts. " So what did you tell them daddy?" asked Eriko. " Oh, the usual. What'll happen to them if they hurt you in any way." said Greg. He laughed at his own joke, you and Corbin laughed too, unsure of whether he was joking or not.

" Could I have my friends back? I need to do some homework with them?" asked Eriko. " Sure, you three have fun." said Greg. The three of you go into Eriko's room, she shut the door and got on her bed. You noticed something about Eriko you did not notice before. She was very well-endowed.

Greg must have made her wear clothes that flattened her chest because Eriko had a very large one in her home clothes. " So guys? " she asked, taking out her worksheets specially constructed for her. " These are pretty easy." she said, looking through the questions. " Man, stop staring at her chest." Corbin whispers to you. Your suddenly brought back to the real world, Eriko helping Corbin with some questions.

You listen on, filling in the answers and correcting Eriko if she made a mistake.
11121212222112221112111.title: Eriko appears, she's done bathing.

111212122221122211121111.content:
As you and Corbin are leaving the house, you feel a need to talk about what you saw with Corbin. " Did you see the size of her chest?" you ask him. " Yeah, I noticed. Did they grow recently, cause I've never seen them around before." replied Corbin, he was just as surprised as you are.

" They must be at least C cups for someone her size." said Corbin. " Or bigger." , you estimate the size of her chest. " Do you Eriko beautiful?" you ask Corbin. " She is, but I've already got a girlfriend. You on the other hand, are single. Go on, make a move." said Corbin teasingly.

" Me and Eriko? As friends yes but in a relationship, I'm not too sure about that." said you. " Think about it, she's beautiful, smart, sweet and kind. Seems like a good catch to me." commented Corbin. " True, but she could really hurt me, even if its an accident." replied you.
111212122221122211121111.title: Switch to you and Corbin after leaving her house.

1122.content:
You look around the yard. It seems a lot bigger than you remembered. You then remember that there used to be more houses next to and behind your aunts house, just like in any subdivision, but they seem to be gone. Now it looks kinda like a farm, with an acre or two of open land, and a large, barn-like building in the distance.

Suddenly, you hear a loud thumping sound coming up from behind you. You whirl around, coming face to face with five toes that come up to your knees. You look up and see the smiling face of a red-headed boy, who looks to be about twelve years old, except for one small fact: he was over fifty feet tall! He was wearing just a pair of cutoff jeans with no shirt. "Hi, Byan!" the boy says.

You stagger back, falling on your ass. "What the hell?!" you cry out. "Who are you?"

"I'm your cousin, Tyler!" the boy said. "Don't you remember me?"

You think back and remember the last time you were here, about three years ago, and then recall the face. You remember Tyler being about a foot shorter than you, and being an energetic, mischievous kid, if a little annoying due to him constantly wanting to hang out with you.

"Uh, yeah, Tyler," you respond. "But, uh... you've changed a little!"

"Yeah, I know," Tyler responds as he sits down. The force of him sitting shakes the ground, and you struggle to stay sitting up straight. "Right after the last time we saw each other, I just woke up one day and started growing. In one week, I went from four feet seven to six feet tall. My mom took me to doctors all over the state, but no one could figure out why. Luckily, my mom works for a clothing company, so she was able to get them to provide me free clothes in exchange for me appearing in some commercials."

"Wow," you say, "so you've just kept growing for the past three years?"

"Yup!" Tyler responds. "Though it seems to have leveled off; I've been right around 65 feet tall for the past few months."

Just then, you hear your aunt's voice call from the house: "Byan! Tyler! Time to eat!"

Without warning, Tyler jumps up and takes a few steps closer to the house. The force of his feet whooshing by you feels like a wind machine. After he sits down again, you carefully get up and run over to the patio where the food is laid out. Tyler motions for you to sit next to him, which you timidly do.

During the meal, Tyler grabs as much food as he can gets his hands on. There are eight turkeys, six of which he eats whole, only removing the bones after he rips all the meat off with his teeth. Tubs full of potato salad, baked beans, and macaroni and cheese, along with jugs of fruit punch, disappear quicker than you can blink. Tyler seems to be ravenous; the amount of food he's eating seems to be enormous even for someone of his size.

"He's always hungry," your aunt tells your mom. "Luckily, the community donates money to buy food for him, and we give back by helping out with people moving, constructing, and things like that. It's actually helped us get a lot closer to our neighbors."

Tyler leans back and lets out a large BURP, shaking the ground. "Tyler!" your aunt scolds. "Cover your mouth when you do that."

Tyler blushes sheepishly. "Sorry, mom," he says.

After the meal, the adults go inside, and you sit next to Tyler awkwardly, trying to think of something to talk about.

"Boy, that was a good meal," he says. "So what do you want to do now?"

"I dunno," you say. "What is there to do around here?"

"Hmm," he says, "well... we could go explore my part of the house." He motions over to the barn across the property. "Or I could give you a tour around town. Or we could play a game"

You think for a second, and then decide

You and Corbin are frozen in place as the giantess simply stares at you. She then turns away and looks forward in an empty gaze. Corbin shoots a confused look at you and you shrug back at him. You slowly walk in front of her. You gather up your courage and speak to the beast.

"Um, hi." The giantess blinks and looks at you. You tell the giantess your name. "This is my friend, Corbin. Um, I think we're going to be here for, um, a while, so I thought that we might introduce ourselves. So, what's your name?"

The giantess let in a deep breath and spoke. "I am referred to as Super Soldier F-153 GT. I am designed to inflict high levels of fear and collateral damage against the enemy with the utmost efficiency. I do not need any distractions to keep me from my full potential." She went back to ignoring the two of you.

Corbin started talking, "F-153 GT? So you're a robot, not a giant girl?"

"I am made of organic material, increased in size seventy times the standard, and reinforced with state-of-the-art technology so that I may sustain my form at this size."

"So, all this is real?" Corbin said as the two of you carefully approached her.

"Yes. All my metallic modifications are designed to support and enhance my organic body. The doctors will be more than happy to explain to you."

You ask her, "Well, how's life?"

"Got any special friends?" Corbin asked hopefully.

"I was conditioned to show no emotion. My purpose will not allow for any emotion, any compassion, or any mercy. I cannot allow anyone to befriend me."

"Harsh..." Corbin says.

"What did you say your name was?" You ask her.

"As stated before, I am known as Super Soldier F-153 GT."

"Yeah, but you need a real name." Corbin says. "How about Kelly?"

"My current name is sufficient."

You couldn't help but notice a hint of loneliness and longing in the Giantesses voice by now.

"Oh come on you must have a real name" you say. She doesn't respond.

"Man I'm going to go talk to that jerky scientist again" says Corbin bored and annoyed.

A few moments later you're about to follow when the giantess put a hand in your path.

"Julie" she says. You look up to see tears threatening to spill in her eyes and the loneliness and longing seem deeper than ever.

"Julie used to be my name before I let my family talk me into becoming this..this freak" she said saying the last part bitterly. She moved her hand out of your path.

"Say what you will but you're not a freak. In fact you're the most gorgeous girl I've ever laid eyes on. Certainly far nicer than the girls our age at my school. By the way Julie is a lovely name."

The Giantesses eyes widened a blush on her cheeks. The first compliments she had received from a guy ever and the 1st time since becoming a test subject she were treated as a real person with real feelings.

122.content:
You were already wearing your bikini and lying on your towel, trying to get a tan on the beach. You were finally resting, after that long, long boat trip. It felt great finally being far away from your parents. People always believed you were parent-dependant, so you decided to make this trip all by yourself to prove them wrong.

It had been difficult for you to get through all the accomodation "rituals". No one could believe you were alone. For that, you had only to blame your "peculiar" height. At 4'10'', most people (specially women), stopped by to ask "Oh, hi darling. Looking for your mommy?". That pissed you off, but it was even worse when the hotel staff tried to take you to the "Kids Area".

But now, you had nothing to worry about anymore. You were lying down, almost falling asleep, while your pale skin tanned a little. You thought it was about time to darken it a little, as your pale white skin, along with your red chicks and pitch-black hair had gotten you the annoying nickname of "Snow White". You hated that.

You fell asleep quickly, trying to keep your mind blank. After some hours, you woke up. You were a little surprised as the sun was still high an bright. You still felt somewhat tired, so you decided to go to sleep again. Soon, you noticed that would be impossible, as most tourists were still around (swimming, chatting, playing sports, laughing, snoring, etc.). You tried in vain to ignore it, until you gave up and got up, taking your towel with you while looking for some place far from the noise.

As you walked through the beach, you noticed a couple playing volleyball. The guy, notably taller than the girl, was easily winning. A particularly fast ball from the guy went flying right towards you, landing just by your feet. Immediatley, the guy shouted at you.

"Ball, please!".

You picked the ball up, but as you prepared to throw it back, you realized you would never be able to send it back from that distance (you were never a sports girl, and definitly not a strong one). Instead, you walked towards the girl, holding the ball with both hands. As you approached her, you heard her say.

"Hey, girl! Wanna come and play? Maybe if you pair with me, we can beat this bully!".

She giggled with this, but you just continued to walk without saying a word. When you finally reached her, you both stared at each other surprised. She was 5'10''! A full foot taller than you. Likewise, she stared down at you, bent down a little and said.

"Hmmm... it's OK if you don't want to play. Sorry if I bothered you".

She sounded a little embarrassed. You felt offended by that, but as you turned around to see the guy she had been playing with, you knew she was right. There was no chance both of you could beat him. He was 6'6''. You felt like a little girl looking at his dad. This intimidated you a little. You gave the ball to the girl and swiftly walked away, continuing your search for a resting place.

After walking for a while, you found an isolated, quiet place. While preparing to rest again, a particulary strong gust of wind sent your towel flying. You could see it landed on a palm tree. It wasn't too high, but you would never be able to get it down alone. You looked around for someone, but there wasn't anyone around. Finally, you spotted a person swimming in the sea. You hated asking for help, but this time you had to.

" Look, your sitting in my palm, you don't have much of a choice. " said Gisele. Bruce sunk down, in defeat. " Fine." said Bruce. Gisele placed a finger under his chin, trying to cheer him up. " Its not so bad, I'll look after you." said Gisele.
1322111111.title: The escape goes well.

13221111111.content:
Bruce sat on the cold hard earth, a few metres away from a warm fire in the cold wilderness where Gisele had stoppped for the night. On it were some deer and the odd elk roasting on a makeshift skewer. " Want some?" asked Gisele as she took a bite.

" No thanks." said Bruce. " So, why do you need me other than protecting my life.?" asked Bruce. " Companionship, a girl can get lonely out here especially a big girl like me." said Gisele. ' You ever considered using your strength for your needs like say dominating an entire city." said Bruce.

" Once or twice but I couldn't beat the army, thats for sure, too many of them." said Gisele. Bruce tried to sleep but he felt too cold. Gisele noticed this and picked him and placed him inside her shirt between her breasts where he would be warm. " Don't get too comfy, its only because your cold." said Gisele.

Bruce closed his eyes, he could hear Giseles massive heart beating away as he dozed off, the giantess protecting him from all kinds of danger.
13221111111.title: They go into the wilderness.

132211111111.content:
Back at the lab, General Stone was furious at Gisele's escape from the facility. " How could let something so damn big out of your sight!" he yelled at a scientist. He took out a pistol and shot one. The body of the scientist crumpled to the floor, blood flowing from the bullet wound.

" Thats the punishment for failing me!" said General Stone. " No need to panic General, we'll catch her. " said Doctor Schneider. " We've implanted her with a microchip that allows us to track her. We're tracking her down as we speak right now." said Dr Schneider.

' Good, now get me the Pentagon, I feel they should know their experiment is out on the loose." said General Stone.
132211111111.title: At the lab..

1323.content:
Bruce ignored the fact that the ground was shaking only moments ago and left the building, he could not be late for this. Being an intern, he was low on the totem pole meaning he was dispensable. He was supposed to interview someone for a job.

Normally Bruce would not do this sort of thing but his boss had been unable to do so and had thrust this upon him. Bruce knew that should he be successful, he might be get promoted sooner than he thought. He only wanted to impress his employers so as to rise up the ranks.

Bruce did not exactly know who he was interviewing, only that they were very special. He was supposed to meet this person outside of town. Bruce did not know what was so special about them but he assumed they were linked to some powerful people.

13231.content:
Bruce went to the bus stop as he was still new on the job and was not eligible for a company car yet and seeing as he couldn't afford one yet, he had to take public transport. The bus stop is empty and Bruce sits down while he waits for the bus. Meanwhile he sees a large figure in the distance. He could tell it was human and perhaps female.

Bruce saw that the figure was coming closer, he watched it for awhile and felt very slight tremors in the ground, whatever that was causing it was still around or happening. The roads were empty plus the sky was dark. It was almost winter and the trees had shed their leaves, which had been swept up by the city.


Snow had yet to fall but it was cold. The large figure was coming even closer now which made Bruce kind of curious as to what it was.
13231.title: He sees a big human while getting there.

132311.title: Its a colossal giant(ess) ! ( At least 20 feet)

choices: The giant doesn't notice the bus stop canopy and watches the offices...
The giant is curious about the thing at his feet...
1323111.content:
The tremors get worse. It's harder for Bruce to read the paper as his seat lurches from beneath him. Though the dim light doesn't help either. He tosses it aside. This will be a long wait without something to distract him from the bus and its unreliable schedule. Just then, the ground rattles. The bus stop bench now feels like a rubber band nearly flinging Bruce headfirst into the canopy. He lands on the same way, but now his seat and ankles ache from the landing. A strange shape stands in the corner of his eye, something big enough to bend the light pole in an awkward angle. Even though it seems to reach as tall as the pole prior to its deformation, its texture illuminated by its dying light looks familiar.

Leather?

Bruce hobbles on his recovering legs to look around the corner of the canopy. The large leather object extends further behind him, almost narrowing like a wedge. "Wait," he thinks. "This looks like a shoe...a GIANT SHOE!" He cranes his neck skyward to see the owner of it.

The giant looks human physically - an enormous man probably in his 20s or so. He looks fairly dressed for the cold, but unusual to Bruce's sense. He has a long-sleeved shirt beneath a fur-lined vest as well as something like jeans. However the fabric of the shirt and pants look lighter than the jacket Bruce is wearing, and the sleeves tend to bunch up around the elbow. This giant guy must be pretty strong. He has long thick hair that seems to extend to ear-length, though at Bruce's visual angle he can see something covering his ears - perhaps earmuffs or headphones. The giant shows no interest in him or the bus stop canopy at the moment but instead focuses on the skyscraper. Maybe he's watching the little humans in their offices, following them with his finger.
1323111.title: First Contact

choices: The giant is nice and wants a tiny friend.
The giant is cruel and wants a tiny slave.
13231112.content:
The heel from the giant's shoe disappears from Bruce's peripheral vision. "Maybe he left," he thinks. "Maybe he walked off and didn't see me." On the plus side, he feels his shape once more to verify he is in one piece after the encounter. But something is amiss. The giant's footsteps really rattled the ground, so much so he almost flew from the bench itself. Why haven't the tremors resumed?

Bruce's curiosity gets the best of him. Another tremor erupts from nowhere - loud and earth-rattling like the first one, but only one. He looks up at the canopy. After the tremor, the top seems to buckle in on himself. He falls to the ground as the metal supports groan and starts to crawl beneath the bench. Sure this may be the last place he wants to be waiting for the bus, but he has no other idea how to escape this. Clutching his head, he watches in horror as the supports groan to a breaking point and snap.

Strange though, the canopy hasn't fully collapsed. There's very little debris from the glassy top or from the supports. He slides like a slug for a better look. The canopy lies as if it was turned over, like a tree after an encounter with a lumberjack. A few more inches along his belly and he could see the giant's eyes. There he stands, one knee resting on the concrete as he leans on the other to look down at Bruce. Bruce attempts to recoil as the giant brushes aside the ripped bus stop canopy.

He keeps his eyes locked on Bruce, smiling. What is the nature behind that smile?
13231112.title: Curiousity

132311121.content:
Bruce crawls from beneath the bench. The giant obviously had the chance to just smash the canopy and bench into a single sheet of metal on the pavement, but has not done it. And besides, the smile does give an impression that he means no harm. He returns to his feet before brushing off whatever junk he crawled through in his previous hiding place.

The giant makes the first move. "Hi..."

Drenched in sweat and shivering in terror, Bruce responds. "H...hhh...hi..."

The giant points towards him, resting his wrist on the pavement. "Are you cold?"

"A...aa...a little," he catches his breath. "More scared actually..."

"Scared?" He bends his head to the side as if confused. "Why are you scared?"

"Because...because you're so big..."

"You're so tiny..." He seems almost to shrug off the idea of being so huge. He puts his fingertip on Bruce's body, petting it like a harmless animal. He knocks off his hat so he can stroke his hair too. "I like you tiny people. You're so fun to watch."

"That's why you were looking in the offices over there?"

The giant nods. "They closed their shades. They were scared too."

"You don't seem so scary anymore I think..." Bruce compliments as he picks up his hat.

"You think so? You're not scared of me?"

"A lil, I suppose."

The giant laughs. "Little like you? You're a funny tiny guy. You want to be my tiny friend?"

Bruce nods. He's not sure what it entails. He hasn't been smashed like a bug and who knows. Maybe things will get interesting in his boring work life. "Sure..."

The giant smiles. He unfolds his palm. "Come, you won't be so cold with me." Bruce obliges but regrets when the giant folds up his hand. His grip feels gentle though as he sets him inside his jeans pocket and takes him to...
132311121.title: He's Friendly

choices: Bruce wants to play a game with Gregory
1323111212.content:
The ride in the giant's pocket wasn't so much a lie on the carrier's behalf. After all, the heat from his body warms it so much so that Bruce breaks a sweat. The downside is the ride itself. Each of his steps rattle the pocket and its contents back and forth. A forward step pushes everything outwards, sending a wave of strage things at Bruce before retreating. The little man grows curious about the biggest structure with him. It looks and feels like leather. He reaches around an enlarged leather gate and slowly pulls it apart. It doesn't seem to be locked like an enormous gate. Must be a wallet, he thinks. Not much light reaches the bottom, but a slight glare exposes an image behind the leather walls for the tiny man to see. It looks plastic and from the parts not reflecting the precious little light, he can see a face - the same face of the giant he encountered on a wall of plastic. A license perhaps, maybe an ID card? Why would a giant need that? There must be more to this guy than just his size...

The pocket goes dark, sending Bruce on the cloth floor. The giant's hand descends down the fabric ravine, fingers wrapping around the tiny man. His grip seems stronger than before, maybe to make sure Bruce doesn't fall. The fingers release and palm goes flat, letting the tiny man lie on its surface. The giant's gleaming eyes fill his view, capped with a harmless smile. "Welcome to my home, little guy..."

Bruce gets back on his feet for a good look. The main room looks no different from any lounge or living room he has seen before - just the size is to fit another scale. At a far wall leading to a hallway, he can see two enormous glass tanks, one filled to the top with water. What kinda fish does he keep in there, he wonders. From a giant's eye view, his house looks moderately clean - very little out of place or dirty. The giant sets Bruce on a large cork coaster on a coffee table neighboring a sofa of phenomenal size. After setting him down there, he slips off his shoes and vest before jumping onto the sofa.

"I forgot to ask," Bruce tries to open up to him a little. After all, he's a guest to this giant's house. "What's your name?"

"Name's Gregory," he says, holding out his hand like he was about to shake with someone his size. "What about yours?"

"Bruce."

Gregory smiles. "Nice to meet you, Bruce. You're most welcome here. If there's anything you want; don't be afraid to ask, my tiny friend."

Bruce contemplates his request...
1323111212.title: The giant's house

13323.content:
Bruce gazes in a circle around the dark tree-filled plane, ears and hands steady...

The whine of a much smaller being pierces his ear before settling somewhere close to the side of his neck. A prick can be felt...

WHAM!

One less mosquito to bother him, but the reprieve won't last.

Unlike his guides, he normally just swatted the air like a madman in the hopes one of the bloodsuckers blunders into the path of his hands. It was only enough to drive them away.

The monkeys are getting louder. Bruce pulls out his binoculars. Still not as safe and bug-free as his desk at work; but it comes with the price of enjoying the outdoors and the exotic atmosphere of the jungle.

He takes a moment to wipe his brow. He didn't notice his guides staying in one place. The binoculars return as he follows the silhouette of some strange flying bird he never seen before. The difficult creature can't stay in one place, forcing Bruce to take more steps to keep up with the shadow.

A guide shouts in his direction. It could be the monkeys and birds above the trees, or the snapping of fallen brush beneath his feet; but he didn't get the message...

SNAP!

One didn't touch the ground anymore. Instead it left the ground and went over Bruce's head. The binoculars disappeared from his eyes and ended up beneath him. He found himself no longer right-side-up in the convenient matter but instead, suspended in midair by a rope digging into his ankle. Below him, he sees the shocked faces of his guides.

"Gimme a hand!" Bruce shouts.

One of the guides brings out a pocket knife and tries to slice into part of the rope trap closest to the tree. Then, progress stops.

The uproar of the monkeys and birds worsens. The ground shakes and in the distance, a large jungle tree snaps at the base and falls to the ground. Bruce can't see what's going on, but he saw his guides paralyzed for a moment while gazing upwards - but at something above him.

Then, they dropped everything and ran.

Bruce forces himself to twist around the rope during the earthquake, only to meet the gaze of a...
13323.title: Welcome to the Jungle

choices: The giant looks confused. Try again...
The giant takes Bruce like his other captives...
133231.content:
A weaker tree gives way to a massive bare foot, bringing it to the ground before crushing the trunk. Bruce cringes at the sound of the wood giving way.

After a few more steps, the colossus stops in front of the captive. He's a massive dark figure, possibly a hundred feet tall at most. He looks strong and covered in reddish markings. His hair is dark and long, probably covering the back of his shoulders. One ear has a stone piercing of some kind. He wears a loincloth of multiple animal pelts. Along his waist he has some sort of rope from which three more captives like Bruce suspend.

The giant looks Bruce in the eye for a moment. His eyes are dark, even more so by the shadows of the jungle trees. One of his hands rises above him. The rope shakes so violently the tiny man could only cringe in pain as it digs into his angle. An audible snap gives some slack as he finds himself suspended like a fly on a string in the giant's hand.

The giant gives one more gaze at his catch. Bruce, still afraid, attempts to wave his hand.

The giant stops to watch, confused.

Bruce attempts a loud "Hello,"

The giant stares.

Bruce could only mouth the next few words, but he repeated them enough over his stuttering lips to make them audible to the colossus holding him.

"Put me down?"
133231.title: Hello, Stranger...

Decides to exploit her, ie circus, sideshow.
134.content:
Bryan sat in the shade of the umbrella on his lifeguard tower staring out at the bodies bobbing in the ocean. Squeals of children playing mixed with the sea gull's cries and crashing waves. His vigilance came from two plus years of experience and saving over a dozen souls from drowning. Two kids played tug-o-war with an inner tube next to a lady floating on a blow up mattress. Teenagers intertwined rose and fell in the undulating water. His eyes were drawn to a single swimmer out past the safety zone. Swimmers who rode the waves out too far would often get pulled out to sea before they realized where they were and could get caught in an undertow. Something seemed wrong with this swimmer something he just couldn't put his finger on but from this distance he just couldn't tell what it was. He grabbed his safety can and put the velcro strap around his ankle. His tan body was trim from hours spent in the water and his red trunks sported the white cross that identified him as a lifeguard. Sand flew behind him as he raced across the beach and into the surf. He dove into the first wave and with powerful strokes cut through the water. He swam past the startled tug-o-war kids closing the distance to the lone swimmer. A mass of blond hair rose and fell from his view.
"I'm here to help," he called out as he swam closer.
"Stay back," a deep melodic voice bellowed.
Bryan was confronted by biggest pair of blue eyes he had ever seen in his life. An aquiline nose, high cheek bones and full lips blended together to make one of the most beautiful faces he could remember.
"I'm perfectly safe," she moved away from him.
He realized she was touching the ocean floor.
"You're standing on the bottom."
"And?" she queried.
"It must be..."
"Twenty feet deep." she snapped
"Yes."
"That would make me...?"
"Over twenty feet tall."
"Try wrapping your mind around this one, I'm a giantess."
Bryan pulled his safety can toward him and used it as float so he wouldn't have to work so hard to stay afloat.
"I've never seen you here before, in fact I've never seen any giants around here before. I didn't realized you existed outside fairy tales."
"I usually swim at another beach but it was closed due to sharks. As you can see we are very real."
134.title: At a beach

1342.content:
" Where do you Giants live?" asked Bryan. The giantess smiled before replying, " I can't tell you that." she said. " Why not?" asked Bryan. " Giant's aren't supposed to tell humans where they all live. " said the giantess. " I'm not quite clear on that." said Bryan. " I cannot bring you to the cities where giants alone, with no humans." said the giantess again.

" Why? Afraid of humans?" said Bryan. " Many giants believe that humans are inferior to them, they should dominate humans, turning them into their slaves." said the giantess. " I wouldn't want to meet of those." said Bryan. " You wouldn't want to, so whats your name?" asked the giantess. " Bryan, yours?" replied Bryan.

" Melody." said the giantess. " Well Melody why don't you come closer to shore?" asked Bryan. " Thats not a good idea." said Melody. " Why? You seem to be very shy." said replied Bryan with a question.
1342.title: Searches to find where Giants live

13421.content:
" Don't take this the wrong way, its because of humans I don't swim to shore." said Melody. Before Bryan could ask she quickly explained. " I've heard from other giants, the stories of humans with giants. And they usually end with the giant being killed by the noble human. So I think that if I went up to shore , they would try to kill me because I'm a giant." explained Melody.

" Well, that has been true." said Bryan. " You know, giants aren't always evil people who want to eat humans." said Melody. " Could you prove it?" said Bryan playfully. " Alright little human, I could eat you but your still here." replied Melody, scooping up Bryan with her hand and putting him into her mouth.'

Inside her mouth, it was warm and humid, Melody's breath smelt slightly mint. " You've got nice teeth." Melody heard Bryan's muffled voice, she spat him out onto her palm where she washed him in seawater to get rid of her saliva on Bryan.

" I believe you." said Bryan.

Alice Anderson had a very active imagination for a ten year old.

She had always fantasized about being in incredible worlds where dragons, mermaids and giants existed.

One day while camping with her parents. The blonde haired blue eyed girl went for a stroll in the woods with her drawing pad and markers. She sat on a rock by a lake.

“Perfect place to draw” she thought but soon the young girl heard loud footsteps. A large shadow consumed the forest and Alice had to look up to see what was going on.

“What the....”

Alice was in complete awe. Standing in the forest was a real life giant!

Alice couldn’t believe it! She always believed in giants but had never actually seen one until now. Her excitement quickly became fear as the giant locked eyes with her.

Alice wanted to run but was petrified as the giant’s hand reached out for her to pick her up.

The giant picking up Alice was...
152.title: Alice’s Adventure

1521.content:
Alice looked up in fear at the grown man who had picked her up off the forest floor. He looked to be in his forties. Evidently he didn't care about his hair, because it was all disheveled! He wasn't exactly muscular, but he wasn't lanky either.

The giant walked over to a tree stump to sit down and really look her over.

After his examination, he said...
1521.title: A giant 40 year old man

choices: Aaron trusts Alice but not her family. He wants to be Alice's family.
1522.content:
Alice was in the hands of a boy her age. The boy had long light brown hair and gray eyes. He would have been an average boy if he wasn't 75 feet tall. Something like a sail was wrapped around the boy's waist. Besides, he wore nothing. The boy lifted Alice to his mouth and opened it. Alice could see the boy's snow-white teeth in the sunlight and the darkening depth behind them. She was scared to death. In fairy tales, giants always ate people. And now he's lunch. She screamed instinctively.
"Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah" She screamed.
"What is this?" The giant exclaimed. And now he looked more closely at what was in his hands.
"Don't eat me! Please!" She begged.
"You're not an animal." He finds it.
"Yes, I'm a kid. Why do you want to swallow me?" Alice asks.
"Not exactly you, I just saw something moving between the trees and I wanted to eat it. I didn't watch what it was." The boy simply replied.
"Do you eat everything you see?" She was surprised.
"Sure. I eat anything smaller than me. And everything smaller than me. I just went to the lake to drink. That's when I saw you and I always eat whenever I can because I don't know when I can next." Alice was educated by the giant.
"And will you eat me too?" She shivered.
"I don't know. I'm glad I can talk to someone. I'm a little lonely." The boy was sad.
Alice felt a little sorry. He looked over at him and saw that his hair was as long as he had never been cut off, his skin was dirty, especially his 15 ft long feet, and he was thin. It is not easy to live alone in the forest.
"Alice."
"What?"
"Alice. My name is Alice. What's your name."
"Aaron."
"Hi Aaron, glad to meet you."
"Me too." Aaron cheered. "For the first time ever, someone greeted me. It's as good as eating a couple of wild boars after a long fast. What are you doing here anyway."
"We're camping with my family." Alice answered honestly.
"You have a family?"
"Yes. Mom, Dad, my sisters Lauren and Cherry, my brother Martin and our two dogs."
"Good for you." The boy sighs. "But now I don't know what to do."
"I promise I won't tell anyone about you. And if you want, I can play with you while we're here."
1522.title: A giant 10 year old boy

choices: The next day, Alice can't find Aaron.
Aaron is very hungry the next day so Alice helps his hunt.
15221.content:
Aaron trusts Alice's sincere smile. In secret, he always wanted a friend. The girl is now lying on the boy's open palm and looking at him.
"What would you like to do?" Aaron asks and a finger swipes at the girl.
"Hahaha. It's tickling." She laughs.
The boy is surprised. He likes Alice's laugh. So he rubs her belly again with his finger. Alice laughs and groans.
"Stop! I can't stand it too ticklish." She begs.
Aaron stops tickling and looks at her expectantly. Alice now sees only a 10-year-old boy, not a dangerous giant. She wants to cheer him up.
"What would you like to do today?" She asks the boy.
"If we hadn't met I would have gone down to the lake to drink and see how warm the water is. Lately it's been cool so I couldn't bathe." The boy complains.
"Then let's go swimming." Shouts to Alice and runs back to the tent for her swimsuit. When she returns to Aaron, she's wearing a pink swimsuit.
"We can go!" She screams enthusiastically.
Aaron picks up the girl and starts walking away. The boy routinely avoids the trees and with his long legs they reach the lake in 10 minutes. Alice is surprised by the size of the lake. The lake is huge and clean. Aaron goes into the water and goes in until the water reaches his waist.
"Good lukewarm." Aaron finds it.
She doesn't have more than that. She jumps into the water from the boy's hand.
"The water is very good." The girl cries.
Alice enjoys swimming and Aaron. The boy is a multifunctional playground. She can climb up to him and jump into the water. And at the edge of the lake, if the boy sits down, his legs can be used as a slide. And he makes big waves with his hands. Alice has a thousand and one ways to have fun. She gives Aaron a nice tickling feeling when she walks over to the boy.
"You don't want to swim?" She asks the boy hours later.
"I can not swim." The boy replies.
"You can't swim! Then I'll teach you." Alice began to teach the boy. By the time they were done, it was late afternoon.
Aaron is lying on the grass and Alice is resting on the boy's chest. As they dry, they talk.
"How long have you lived here?"
"I do not know."
"Where are your parents?"
"I do not know."
"Have you always been this big?"
"I don't know. I don't remember anything before. Either I forgot it or it happened a long time ago. But sometimes I dream that a man and a woman hold my hand and they smile at me."
They talk about anything that comes to their mind. Alice tells the boy jokes. Aaron laughs a lot because he hasn't heard a joke before.
They go back to the camp at dusk. They says goodbye.
15221.title: Aaron trusts Alice. They play.

choices: Alice will be Stockholm syndrome and apologize to Aaron. (Years leater love him)
15222.content:
Aaron looked at her long. He didn't want to hurt her, and even wanted to spend more time with her. He never had a family. But Alice's family wouldn't let her play with him. Aaron decided. He put Alice on the branches of a tall tree.
"Stay here, I'll be back soon." With that, he set off among the trees.
Alice was sitting on a tree branch.
"What will happen to me. Aaron doesn't look bad. Maybe I can convince him to let me go. Maybe we'll even be friends." Alice thought about these when she saw the boy's head pop out from behind the leaves of a tree.
"I came back." He said cheerfully.
But Alice saw that something had changed for him. The boy's belly was flat when he left but it was bulging when he came back. She had a bad feeling.
"Are you tired?" The boy asked worriedly. "If you want we can go home."
"That would be good. Thank you." Alice said.
Aaron picked her up carefully and walked away. But not toward the clearing where Alice came from, but toward the mountains in the opposite direction. They went until they reached a huge cave. The boy went inside. It was spacious. The ground was covered with leaves, especially in the corner where the boy used to sleep. Aaron walked over and sat down on the huge stack of leaves.
"Welcome home." He smiled at her.
"What?" She asked frightened.
"I am your family now." He always said with a smile.
"But I already have a family and they must be worried about me." She explained.
"Calm down. They're not missing you. I think they're glad you're not there with them." Aaron reassured Alice.
"Where?" He asked almost crying.
"Here!" He pointed to his belly.
Alice burst into tears. She cried loudly as the cave echoed into her.
"You don't cry! Nobody will hurt you. And your family will be a part of me. So I'll be your family. That's good. After a week of fasting, I finally ate and even got a sister. It's one of the best days of my life." He tried to comfort Alic.
"But you ate all five of them!" Sniff the girl.
"Seven." Aaron corrected her. "There are five people and two dogs inside my tummy."
"Even the dogs?" She cried again.
"Well, you said they were a part of the family and I wanted to be your whole family. So yes."
Aaron picked up Alic and hugged her gently.
"I'm here for you. Forever."

1552.content:
Lisa Thompson was an average middle school student. Her ambitions right now included entering high school, and succeeding at life. Seeing as the former of these was at least guaranteed, she was happy with life.

Lisa had long brown hair, often tied back into a ponytail because she thought it was cute, with green eyes, oval glasses, and pierced ears. She wouldn't stick out in a crowd, but neither would she want to. Lisa hobbies included... the internet, more or less. Whether it was online streaming, online gaming, or online arguing, she was down for it.

But that's enough about her for now. You're obviously reading this because you want her to meet a giant person. So we'll get to that bit.

Where does Lisa meet her giant(ess)?

info.description:
In this story you basically choose your character, and this character will enconter and interact with a giant(ess).

-Rules-


-Length Rule-
(Don't make chapter that are too short. Chapters should to be at least a paragraph in length.)

-Size Consistency Rule-
(No sizechanging! Do not change the sizes of the characters once they are set.)

-Personality Consistency Rule-
(Keep it consistent. No characters suddenly become evil, or nice.)

-Gender Equality Rule-
(Some people like male only interaction, and some like female only interaction. Always keep a choce for another gender just in case.)

Other than that I won't edit/delete much. Now have a good time reading and writing.
